text: Karl Åke Henry Allard (21 November 1911 – 23 October 1996) was a Swedish Social Democrat politician.Allard, Henry in Vem är det, 1993 edition He was a member of the Riksdag from 1943 until 1979. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Speakers of the Riksdag
title: Henry Allard
